title: God Remembers You | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: God Remembers You | Joel Osteen
description:
It’s easy to feel forgotten or insignificant when we're still waiting for our dreams to come to pass. But the Scripture says God never forgets us. He sees every struggle and trial, and He's working to lead you into victory. 


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
